CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1951, pg. 15, reads: "Boxing's Cinderella Man - Jersey Joe Walcott, who'll be getting his fifth crack at the heavyweight championship of the world when he faces the current titleholder, Ezzard Charles, here at Forbes Field, July 18, is nearing peak condition for the crucial battle. The New Jersey battler is pictured going through his training paces at his camp at Rainbow Gardens, McKeesport... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Boxer "Jersey" Joe Walcott talking with man, possibly manager, in boxing ring with Bill Nunn Jr. in audience on right, at Rainbow Gardens, McKeesport
